00025 #ifndef SYX_OBJECT_H
00026 #define SYX_OBJECT_H
00027 
00028 #include "syx-utils.h"
00029 #include "syx-platform.h"
00030 #include "syx-enums.h"
00031 #include "syx-error.h"
00032 #include "syx-init.h"
00033 
00034 #include <stdlib.h>
00035 #include <string.h>
00036 
00037 #ifdef HAVE_LIBGMP
00038 #include <gmp.h>
00039 #endif
00040 
00041 
00042 SYX_BEGIN_DECLS
00043 
00044 #define SYX_OBJECT(oop) ((SyxObject *) (oop))
00045 #define SYX_OBJECT_FLOAT(oop) (*((syx_double *)(SYX_OBJECT(oop)->data)))
00046 
00047 #ifdef HAVE_LIBGMP
00048 #define SYX_OBJECT_LARGE_INTEGER(oop) (*(mpz_t *)(SYX_OBJECT(oop)->data))
00049 #endif
00050 
00051 #define SYX_OBJECT_SYMBOL(oop) ((syx_symbol)(SYX_OBJECT(oop)->data))
00052 #define SYX_OBJECT_STRING(oop) ((syx_string)(SYX_OBJECT(oop)->data))
00053 #define SYX_OBJECT_BYTE_ARRAY(oop) ((syx_uint8 *)(SYX_OBJECT(oop)->data))
00054 #define SYX_OBJECT_VARS(oop) (SYX_OBJECT(oop)->vars)
00055 #define SYX_OBJECT_DATA_SIZE(oop) (SYX_OBJECT(oop)->data_size)
00056 #define SYX_OBJECT_DATA(oop) (SYX_OBJECT(oop)->data)
00057 #define SYX_OBJECT_HAS_REFS(oop) (SYX_OBJECT(oop)->has_refs)
00058 #define SYX_OBJECT_IS_MARKED(oop) (SYX_OBJECT(oop)->is_marked)
00059 #define SYX_OBJECT_IS_CONSTANT(oop) (SYX_OBJECT(oop)->is_constant)
00060 
00061 #define SYX_IS_NIL(oop) ((oop) == 0 || (oop) == syx_nil)
00062 #define SYX_IS_TRUE(oop) ((oop) == syx_true)
00063 #define SYX_IS_FALSE(oop) ((oop) == syx_false)
00064 #define SYX_IS_BOOLEAN(oop) (SYX_IS_TRUE(oop) || SYX_IS_FALSE(oop))
00065 #define SYX_IS_OBJECT(oop) (SYX_IS_POINTER(oop) &&                      \
00066                             (oop) >= (SyxOop)syx_memory &&              \
00067                             (oop) < (SyxOop)(syx_memory + _syx_memory_size))
00068 #define SYX_IS_CPOINTER(oop) (SYX_IS_POINTER(oop) &&                    \
00069                               ((oop) < (SyxOop)syx_memory ||            \
00070                                (oop) >= (SyxOop)(syx_memory + _syx_memory_size)))
00071 
00072 #define SYX_OBJECT_IS_STRING(oop) (SYX_IS_OBJECT(oop) && SYX_OBJECT(oop)->klass == syx_string_class)
00073 #define SYX_OBJECT_IS_SYMBOL(oop) (SYX_IS_OBJECT(oop) && SYX_OBJECT(oop)->klass == syx_symbol_class)
00074 #define SYX_OBJECT_IS_FLOAT(oop) (SYX_IS_OBJECT(oop) && SYX_OBJECT(oop)->klass == syx_float_class)
00075 #define SYX_OBJECT_IS_LARGE_INTEGER(oop) (SYX_IS_OBJECT(oop) && SYX_OBJECT(oop)->klass == syx_large_integer_class)
00076 
00077 /* Oop */
00078 
00079 typedef struct SyxObject SyxObject;
00080 
00082 struct SyxObject
00083 {
00085   SyxOop klass;
00086   
00088   syx_bool has_refs;
00089 
00091   syx_bool is_marked;
00092 
00094   syx_bool is_constant;
00095 
00097   SyxOop *vars;
00098 
00100   syx_varsize data_size;
00101 
00103   SyxOop *data;
00104 };
00105 
00106 extern EXPORT SyxObject *syx_memory;
00107 extern EXPORT syx_int32 _syx_memory_size;
00108 
00110 #define SYX_MEMORY_INDEX_OF(oop) ((((SyxOop)oop) - (SyxOop)syx_memory) / sizeof (SyxObject))
00111

00149 EXPORT SyxOop syx_object_new_vars (SyxOop klass, syx_varsize vars_size);
00150 #define syx_object_new(klass) (syx_object_new_vars ((klass), SYX_SMALL_INTEGER (SYX_CLASS_INSTANCE_SIZE ((klass)))))
00151 EXPORT SyxOop syx_object_new_size (SyxOop klass, syx_bool has_refs, syx_varsize size);
00152 EXPORT SyxOop syx_object_new_data (SyxOop klass, syx_bool has_refs, syx_varsize size, SyxOop *data);
00153 EXPORT SyxOop syx_object_copy (SyxOop object);
00154 EXPORT void syx_object_free (SyxOop oop);
00155 EXPORT void syx_object_resize (SyxOop oop, syx_varsize size);
00156 #define syx_object_grow_by(oop,size) (syx_object_resize((oop),SYX_OBJECT_DATA_SIZE(oop)+size))
00157 EXPORT syx_int32 syx_object_get_variable_index (SyxOop self, syx_symbol name);
00158 EXPORT void syx_object_initialize (SyxOop oop);

00160 
00162 INLINE syx_int32
00163 syx_object_hash (SyxOop object)
00164 {
00165   /* distinguish between objects and embedded values */
00166   if (SYX_IS_OBJECT (object))
00167     return SYX_MEMORY_INDEX_OF (object);
00168 
00169   /* i don't know how to hash C pointers sorry */
00170   return SYX_SMALL_INTEGER_EMBED (object);
00171 }
00172 
00179 INLINE SyxOop 
00180 syx_object_get_class (SyxOop object)
00181 {
00182   /* ordered by usage */ 
00183 
00184   if (SYX_IS_OBJECT(object))
00185     return SYX_OBJECT(object)->klass;
00186 
00187   if (SYX_IS_SMALL_INTEGER(object))
00188     return syx_small_integer_class;
00189 
00190   if (SYX_IS_NIL(object))
00191     return syx_undefined_object_class;
00192   
00193   if (SYX_IS_CHARACTER(object))
00194     return syx_character_class;
00195 
00196   if (SYX_IS_CPOINTER(object))
00197     return syx_cpointer_class;
00198 
00199   syx_error ("unknown object\n");
00200   return syx_nil;
00201 }
00202 
00203 
00204 
00210 INLINE void
00211 syx_object_set_class (SyxOop object, SyxOop klass)
00212 {
00213   if (!SYX_IS_OBJECT(object))
00214     return;
00215 
00216   SYX_OBJECT(object)->klass = klass;
00217 }

00260 #define SYX_CLASS_SUBCLASSES(oop) (SYX_OBJECT_VARS(oop)[SYX_VARS_CLASS_SUBCLASSES])

00272 #define SYX_ASSOCIATION_VALUE(oop) (SYX_OBJECT_VARS(oop)[SYX_VARS_ASSOCIATION_VALUE])

00321 
00327 INLINE syx_varsize
00328 syx_object_vars_size (SyxOop object)
00329 {
00330   SyxOop klass = syx_object_get_class (object);
00331   return SYX_SMALL_INTEGER (SYX_CLASS_INSTANCE_SIZE (klass));
00332 }
00333 
00334 
00335 /* Inlined constructors */
00336 
00337 
00339 INLINE SyxOop
00340 syx_float_new (syx_double floating)
00341 {
00342   SyxOop oop = syx_object_new_size (syx_float_class, FALSE, sizeof (syx_double));
00343   SYX_OBJECT_FLOAT(oop) = floating;
00344   return oop;
00345 }
00346 
00347 
00354 INLINE SyxOop 
00355 syx_byte_array_new (syx_varsize size, syx_uint8 *data)
00356 {
00357   return syx_object_new_data (syx_byte_array_class, FALSE, size, (SyxOop *)data);
00358 }
00359 
00361 INLINE SyxOop 
00362 syx_byte_array_new_size (syx_varsize size)
00363 {
00364   return syx_object_new_size (syx_byte_array_class, FALSE, size);
00365 }
00366 
00368 INLINE SyxOop
00369 syx_byte_array_new_ref (syx_varsize size, syx_uint8 *data)
00370 {
00371   SyxOop oop = syx_byte_array_new_size (size);
00372   memcpy (SYX_OBJECT_DATA (oop), data, size * sizeof (syx_uint8));
00373   return oop;
00374 }
00375 
00382 INLINE SyxOop 
00383 syx_array_new (syx_varsize size, SyxOop *data)
00384 {
00385   return syx_object_new_data (syx_array_class, TRUE, size, data);
00386 }
00387 
00389 INLINE SyxOop 
00390 syx_array_new_size (syx_varsize size)
00391 {
00392   return syx_object_new_size (syx_array_class, TRUE, size);
00393 }
00394 
00396 INLINE SyxOop
00397 syx_array_new_ref (syx_varsize size, SyxOop *data)
00398 {
00399   SyxOop oop = syx_array_new_size (size);
00400   memcpy (SYX_OBJECT_DATA(oop), data, size * sizeof (SyxOop));
00401   return oop;
00402 }
00403 
00404 
00409 INLINE SyxOop 
00410 syx_string_new (syx_symbol string, ...)
00411 {
00412   syx_string new_string;
00413   SYX_VSPRINTF (string, new_string);
00414   if (!new_string)
00415     return syx_nil;
00416 
00417   return syx_object_new_data (syx_string_class, FALSE, strlen (string) + 1, (SyxOop *)new_string);
00418 }
00419 
00421 INLINE SyxOop
00422 syx_string_new_ref (syx_string string)
00423 {
00424   if (!string)
00425     return syx_nil;
00426 
00427   return syx_object_new_data (syx_string_class, FALSE, strlen (string) + 1, (SyxOop *)string);
00428 }
00429 
00431 INLINE SyxOop
00432 syx_variable_binding_new (SyxOop key, syx_int32 index, SyxOop dictionary)
00433 {
00434   SyxOop object = syx_object_new (syx_variable_binding_class);
00435   SYX_ASSOCIATION_KEY(object) = key;
00436   SYX_ASSOCIATION_VALUE(object) = syx_small_integer_new (index);
00437   SYX_VARIABLE_BINDING_DICTIONARY(object) = dictionary;
00438   return object;
00439 }
00440 
00444 INLINE SyxOop
00445 syx_semaphore_new (void)
00446 {
00447   SyxOop object = syx_object_new (syx_globals_at ("Semaphore"));
00448   syx_object_initialize (object);
00449   return object;
00450 }
00451 
00457 INLINE SyxOop 
00458 syx_dictionary_new (syx_varsize size)
00459 {
00460   SyxOop dict = syx_object_new_size (syx_dictionary_class, TRUE, size * 2);
00461   SYX_DICTIONARY_TALLY (dict) = syx_small_integer_new (0);
00462   return dict;
00463 }
00464 
00470 INLINE SyxOop 
00471 syx_block_closure_new (SyxOop block)
00472 {
00473   SyxOop object = syx_object_new (syx_block_closure_class);
00474   SYX_BLOCK_CLOSURE_BLOCK(object) = block;
00475   return object;
00476 }
